name: Camp Spooky
description:
Extremely early prototype build of Camp Spooky.

It’s almost time for our annual s'mores night! Everything’s all set up and ready aside of the fact that ALL THE MARSHMELLOWS ARE MISSING! Without marshmallows smores night will be sponsored by the counselor’s health program. S'mores night will become lettuce night, nobody wants lettuce night! Find the hidden marshmellows while avoiding certain camp legends.
